sql.name: branchesWithoutClassesCommits
sql.query: SELECT B.CD_BRANCH,B.NM_BRANCH FROM TB_BRANCH B WHERE B.CD_PROJECT = ?

sql.name: commitsWithoutChanges
sql.query: SELECT DS_HASH,DS_AUTHOR_NAME,DS_AUTHOR_EMAIL,DT_AUTHOR_DATE,DS_COMMITTER_NAME,DS_COMMITTER_EMAIL,DT_COMMITTER_DATE, DS_FULL_MESSAGE,DS_SHORT_MESSAGE,CD_BRANCH FROM TB_COMMIT C WHERE C.CD_BRANCH = ? ORDER BY C.DT_COMMITTER_DATE ASC

sql.name: changeCommitsByCommit
sql.query: SELECT CC.CD_COMMIT_CHANGE,CC.DS_CHANGE_TYPE,NM_OLD_FILENAME,NM_NEW_FILENAME FROM TB_COMMIT_CHANGE CC WHERE CC.DS_HASH = ?

sql.name: classCommitChangeByClass
sql.query: SELECT CCC.`CD_COMMIT_CHANGE`, CCC.`CD_CLASS`, CCC.`ACAIC`, CCC.`ACMIC`, CCC.`AID`, CCC.`ANA`, CCC.`CAM`, CCC.`CBO`, CCC.`CIS`, CCC.`CLD`, CCC.`CP`, CCC.`DAM`, CCC.`DCAEC`, CCC.`DCC`, CCC.`DCMEC`, CCC.`DIT`, CCC.`DSC`, CCC.`EIC`, CCC.`EIP`, CCC.`ICH`, CCC.`IR`, CCC.`LCOM1`, CCC.`LCOM2`, CCC.`LCOM5`, CCC.`LOC`, CCC.`McCabe`, CCC.`MFA`, CCC.`MOA`, CCC.`NAD`, CCC.`NCM`, CCC.`NCP`, CCC.`NMA`, CCC.`NMD`, CCC.`NMI`, CCC.`NMO`, CCC.`NOA`, CCC.`NOC`, CCC.`NOD`, CCC.`NOF`, CCC.`NOH`, CCC.`NOM`, CCC.`NOP`, CCC.`NOPM`, CCC.`NOTC`, CCC.`NOTI`, CCC.`NPrM`, CCC.`PIIR`, CCC.`PP`, CCC.`REIP`, CCC.`RFC`, CCC.`RFP`, CCC.`RPII`, CCC.`RRFP`, CCC.`RRTP`, CCC.`RTP`, CCC.`SIX`, CCC.`WMC` FROM `db_gitMiner`.`TB_CLASS_COMMIT_CHANGE` CCC,TB_COMMIT_CHANGE CC,TB_COMMIT C WHERE CD_CLASS = ? AND CCC.CD_COMMIT_CHANGE = CC.CD_COMMIT_CHANGE AND CC.DS_HASH = C.DS_HASH ORDER BY C.DT_COMMITTER_DATE

sql.name: smellsByChange
sql.query: SELECT DS.CD_DETECTED_SMELL,DS.NM_DETECTED_SMELL,DS.DS_OBSERVACAO FROM TB_DETECTED_SMELL DS WHERE DS.CD_COMMIT_CHANGE = ? AND DS.CD_CLASS = ?

sql.name: classByChange
sql.query: SELECT DISTINCT CD_CLASS FROM TB_COMMIT_CHANGE WHERE CD_CLASS IS NOT NULL AND NM_FILE = ?

sql.name: classByChangeDuplicate
sql.query: SELECT CD_CLASS FROM TB_COMMIT_CHANGE WHERE CD_COMMIT_CHANGE = (SELECT MAX(CD_COMMIT_CHANGE) FROM TB_COMMIT_CHANGE WHERE NM_FILE = ? AND CD_COMMIT_CHANGE < ? AND CD_CLASS IS NOT NULL)
